name: Big Enough Town
description:
"This Town ain't big enough for the two of us"

Challenge your friends to a duel to the death.

Player 1  > WASD to shoot

Player 2  >  arrows to shoot

 ESC for pause menu

This was a personal project I developed in a couple of days as an exercise to learn Unity.  I was initially planning to add a better UI and some background art before releasing it, but I never came back to the project so I uploaded it as it is
